title: Google was working on a radically different “At A Glance” widget that never saw the light of day
content:
With the Pixel 6 series, Google introduced a redesigned At A Glance widget. The updated widget can show your calendar events, your flight boarding pass, workout stats, and more. But it appears, there was an even more powerful and smarter version of the At A Glance widget in the works, which unfortunately never saw the

The post Google was working on a radically different “At A Glance” widget that never saw the light of day appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Google was internally working on a radically different At A Glance widget that never saw the light of day. Read on to learn more.
